sentences.sContent: He created many unforgettable characters in his novels.
sentences.sContent_eng: He created many unforgettable characters in his novels.
sentences.sCn: 他在他的小说中创造了很多令人难忘的人物。

sentences.sContent: He spent so many unforgettable days with them that he was loath to part with them.
sentences.sContent_eng: He spent so many unforgettable days with them that he was loath to part with them.
sentences.sCn: 他与他们一起度过那么多难忘的日子， 他舍不得离开他们。

sentences.sContent: For this reason, many travelers choose to return again and again to the unforgettable "Land of Smiles".
sentences.sContent_eng: For this reason, many travelers choose to return again and again to the unforgettable "Land of Smiles".
sentences.sCn: 正因为如此，许多游客会一次又一次地回到那令人难忘的“微笑之国”。

trans.tranOther: an unforgettable experience, sight etc affects you so strongly that you will never forget it, especially because it is particularly good or beautiful
